roleset.name: a trial period
roleset.note: PROBATION-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from probation.01-n)

example.name: 'as a lawyer' is arg 1 because he had to prove to be a good lawyer first
example.text: He endured a twelve-month probation as a lawyer before partnership discussions could take place.

example.name: trial period to prove good behavior
example.text: Her probation for killing her 4-year-old by scalding it to death in the bathtub
example.arg: for killing her 4-year-old by scalding it to death in the bathtub
